Text:
Thanks for another great torrent, Michael Card is wonderful, it will be a huge blessing to build up my collection!

Also - thanks belatedly for including the Rend Collective Experiment album "Homemade Worship By Handmade People" in your first bundle of the year - do you also happen to have the first album, "Organic Family Hymnal"? I'd love to hear their earlier stuff too.

Thanks again for your spectacular work!

ImmenseDisciple, sure I've got that Rend Collective Experiment album.  It will only be a small discography of three (two albums and an officially released single) but let me share that with you right now...
